Chapter 5, Section 146, Malamulo a Malawi akufotokoza amaudindo amumamizi mu Chapter V, Section 146 ya Malawi Constitution, yomwe imapanga malamulo okhudza mmene boma likuyendera. Izi zikuphatikiza kulemekeza ufulu wa anthu ndi kuonetsetsa kuti ntchito zamaboma zimagwira ntchito bwino. Malamulo a Local Government Act (1998) akufotokoza za amaudindo a magulu a anthu mu mamizi. Amamanga malamulo a kasamalidwe ka ndalama komanso njira zothetsera mavuto a anthu. Chifukwa cha izi, amaudindo amumamizi akuyenera kutsatira malamulo ndikulimbikitsa ubwenzi ndi anthu omwe akukhudzidwa.

Chapter:  4, section:  20, Malamulo a Malawi amawonenetsa kuti anthu akumuzi akuyenera kukhala ndi mwayi wotengedwa mu nyumba yamalamulo. Chapter IV, Section 20 ya Malawi Constitution imalimbikitsa ufulu wopanga mawu, kuwonetsa, komanso kutenga nawo mbali muzochitika za boma. Izi zikutanthauza kuti anthu akumuzi akhoza kuyimba nyumba yamalamulo kuti akalankhule za zovuta, kupanga mafunso, ndi kutenga nawo mbali mu kupanga malamulo kapena njira zomwe zikukhudzana ndi chikhalidwe chawo. Chifukwa chake, malamulo a Malawi akuthandiza kuti anthu akumuzi akhale ndi ufulu wofunikira pa zochitika za nyumba yamalamulo.

Boma lingapereke maphrogramu a chithandizo cha zamankhwala komanso mabungwe a chitetezo, omwe angathandize kuti anthu okalamba akhale ndi mwayi wosankha zomwe akufuna, kupereka ufulu wopanga, komanso kukhazikitsa njira zotheka za chithandizo.
